title: April Is The Cruellest Month: How We Got Here #13 (Preview) Infected Georgia #3 Viral Thoughts & #3
description:
Where we are now? And what will the current crisis of 2020 mean to the future? We explore this question in episode #13 of How We Got Here. (Which is also the first Where We Are.) The Teens of the 21st Century were a crazy era. Political polarity was spread through new forms of media producing new forms of stupidity and hysteria.And then from a fairly unregarded province of China came whispers of a strange virus. And by April of 2020 much of the world was under lockdowns and quarantines in the first truly instantaneous global event in history. The questions began to form... what will the world be like after this moment in history? Give ear to our story. Maybe you will learn something.

PLEASE CONTRIBUTE TO THIS CHANNEL THROUGH PAYPAL to get extra content and help us out. 
https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=G9LDYMSPZ5RGG

Watch this video for more about our extra content:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nykTp3TziRY

My other YouTube channel is this one: https://www.youtube.com/user/gulagzero 
The Anadromous Life essay site for more in depth ideas: https://theanadromist.wordpress.com/ 
The Gravity From Above site for more artistic ideas involving puppetry, music, dance and other arts. https://gravityfromabove.wordpress.com/ 
And if you want to communicate with me use The Anadromous Life Facebook page. https://www.facebook.com/theanadromist/ 

(I don't want to have to make my personal page private because I have too many 'friends'. If it's dialogue you want go there. I'll start 'community' page soon enough if the demand is there.) 



AND FOR MORE ON TBILISI GEORGIA CHECK OUT OUR NEW CHANNEL GEORGIAN CROSSROADS:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCeFJ6Tm71ieNcjcUb-Trc8g


Thanks for watching, more coming soon! 

Meanwhile dig into the Anadromous past. Swim against the stream my friends. 

From Tbilisi Georgia (Look it up on a map!) 
Byrne


#pandemic #quarantine #lockdown
